official_title: A bill to amend title 39 of the United States Code to prohibit the Postal Service from limiting regular daily mail to fewer than six days each week, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Prohibits the Postal Service from reducing the types and frequency of mail delivery service below the types and frequency in effect for the week beginning April 7, 1981.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39 of the United States Code to prohibit the Postal Service from limiting regular daily mail to fewer than six days each week, and for other purposes.
